testcase.name: test_register_successful
testcase.system-out: --------------------------------- Captured Out --------------------------------- [Auth endpoints - Register successful] ✔ When I POST "/api/register" with json: | email | eve.holt@reqres.in | | password | pistol | [Auth endpoints - Register successful] ✔ Then the response status code should be 200 [Auth endpoints - Register successful] ✔ And the response should match the schema "register_success_schema.json"

testcase.name: test_register_missing_password__400
testcase.system-out: --------------------------------- Captured Out --------------------------------- [Auth endpoints - Register missing password -> 400] ✔ When I POST "/api/register" with json: | email | sydney@fife | [Auth endpoints - Register missing password -> 400] ✔ Then the response status code should be 400 [Auth endpoints - Register missing password -> 400] ✔ And the response should match the schema "register_error_schema.json"

testcase.name: test_create_user
testcase.system-out: --------------------------------- Captured Out --------------------------------- [Create/Update/Delete user - Create user] ✔ When I POST "/api/users" with json: | name | morpheus | | job | leader | [Create/Update/Delete user - Create user] ✔ Then the response status code should be 201 [Create/Update/Delete user - Create user] ✔ And the response should match the schema "create_user_schema.json"

testcase.name: test_full_update_user_put
testcase.system-out: --------------------------------- Captured Out --------------------------------- [Create/Update/Delete user - Full update user (PUT)] ✔ When I PUT "/api/users/2" with json: | name | morpheus | | job | zion resident | [Create/Update/Delete user - Full update user (PUT)] ✔ Then the response status code should be 200 [Create/Update/Delete user - Full update user (PUT)] ✔ And the response should match the schema "update_user_schema.json"

testcase.name: test_partial_update_user_patch

testcase.name: test_delete_user
testcase.system-out: --------------------------------- Captured Out --------------------------------- [Create/Update/Delete user - Delete user] ✔ When I DELETE "/api/users/2" [Create/Update/Delete user - Delete user] ✔ Then the response status code should be 204
